caption.p:
Spatial patterns of change in mean, variability and extreme precipitation. Change in precipitation ( a) mean, ( b) seasonal standard deviation, ( c) daily standard deviation, and ( d) daily maximum for the CMIP5 multi-model mean in 2071–2100 relative to 1976–2005 scaled by the change in global mean surface air temperature. Stippling indicates gridpoints where at least 67% of models agree on the sign of the change. Maps were generated using NCL
53 .
